title: Search Far and Wide (4C56)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Fellowship: Spot a Dwarf and discard the top card of your draw deck to draw 2 cards.
Lore:	”'We have been set many riddles since we came to Tol Brandir, but this is the hardest to unravel.'”
Rarity:	C
